cause.description:
To help guys understand the confusion girls put us through... and to rise above it...
1. no more not understanding the woman species
2. Guys dont need to be in a relationship to have fun
3. no more being left in the dark or standing in the door way
cause.mission: If thou is confused art thou woman thou shalst suffer no more... know your girls...
cause.name: Girls!!! Girls!!! Girls!!!
